name: Sql Table Plugin
author: Guy Morazain

sections.description:
sqltable lets you use a short code to make a tabular representation of the data returned by a query
You can control the class for the table, the even and odd rows, each column or a row, the header row and the footer row.
You can specify functions such as min, max and sum of a column to dipaly on the footer.
